name: @liquid-carrot/carrot
description: A Simple Node.js AI Library for Neural Network

scripts.preversion:deep: npm run build:stash && git pull && npm test && git add . && git commit -am 'Auto Sync'; git push;
scripts.version:deep: npm version $TYPE -no-git-tag-version && ./node_modules/.bin/webpack && git add . && git commit -m 'Version bump'
scripts.postversion:deep: git push && npm publish && npm run build; npm run build:pop
scripts.build:docs: npm run jsdoc && npm run deploy:docs
scripts.deploy:docs: git add . && git stash && git branch -f gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages && git reset --hard origin/master && git merge --squash --strategy-option=theirs stash && git stash drop && git commit -m 'Auto-build' && git push origin gh-pages -f && git checkout master
scripts.build:pop: git stash pop && rm -f .temp && git add .temp
scripts.build: npm run build:stash && npm run build:docs; npm run build:pop
scripts.clean:docfiles: find . -type f -name '*.html' -exec rm {} + && rm -rf styles/ && rm -rf scripts

author: Liquid Carrot <people@liquidcarrot.io> (https://liquidcarrot.io)
